filtertest {
    alabama {
        alaska {
            arizona {"arkansas"}
            california {"colorado"}
        }
        connecticut {
            arizona {"delaware"}
            california {"florida"}
        }
    }
    // test suffixes
    fornia {
        hawaii {"idaho"}
        illinois {"indiana"}
    }
    mississippi {
        louisiana {
            maine {"maryland"}
            iowa {"kansas"}
            missouri {"montana"}
        }
        michigan {
            maine {"minnesota"}
            iowa {"kentucky"}
            missouri {"nebraska"}
        }
        nevada {
            maine {"new-hampshire"}
            iowa {"new-mexico"}
            missouri {"new-york"}
        }
    }
}
